Package imagingbook.lib.math.eigen

    Solver for generalized symmetric eigenproblems.
    Version:
    2021/11/11

      GeneralizedSymmetricEigenSolver​(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix A, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix B, double rsth, double apth)
      Solves the generalized symmetric eigenproblem of the form A x = lambda B x, where matrices A, B are symmetric and B is positive definite.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GeneralizedSymmetricEigenSolver

        public GeneralizedSymmetricEigenSolver​(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix A,
                                       org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix B,
                                       double rsth,
                                       double apth)
        Solves the generalized symmetric eigenproblem of the form A x = lambda B x, where matrices A, B are symmetric and B is positive definite. See Sec. 11.0.5. of Press, Teukolsky, Vetterling, Flannery. "Numerical Recipes". Cambridge University Press, third ed. (2007). An exception is thrown if A is not symmetric and the Cholesky decomposition throws an exception if B is not symmetric and positive definite.
        Parameters:
        A - real symmetric matrix
        B - real symmetric and positive definite matrix
        rsth - relative symmetry threshold
        apth - absolute positivity threshold

      • GeneralizedSymmetricEigenSolver
